Uses of Class
com.google.appinventor.components.annotations.SimpleObject

  • Packages that use SimpleObject 
    Package Description
    com.google.appinventor.components.runtime
    Components for App Inventor runtime library.
    com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.errors
    Runtime errors that can occur in App Inventor apps.
    com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.util
    Utilities supporting the component code.

      Physical world component that can detect shaking and measure acceleration in three dimensions.

      Camera provides access to the phone's camera
      class  Canvas
      A two-dimensional touch-sensitive rectangular panel on which drawing can be done and sprites can be moved.

      Check box with the ability to detect initialization, focus change (mousing on or off of it), and user clicks.

      A component that provides a high-level interface to a LEGO MINDSTORMS EV3 robot, which provides sound functionalities.

      A component that provides a high-level interface to a touch sensor on a LEGO MINDSTORMS EV3 robot.

    • Uses of SimpleObject in com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.errors

      Classes in com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.errors with annotations of type SimpleObject 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsError
      Runtime error indicating an array access with an index that is outside of the array bounds.
      class  AssertionFailure
      Runtime error indicating an assert failure.
      class  ConversionError
      Runtime error indicating a failed attempt of converting a value of a type into a value of another type, e.g.
      class  FileAlreadyExistsError
      Runtime error indicating that the attempt to create a file failed because there is a file already existing with the same name.
      class  FileIOError
      Runtime error indicating a problem accessing a file.
      class  IllegalArgumentError
      Runtime error indicating an illegal value for a function or procedure argument.
      class  NoSuchFileError
      Runtime error indicating that no file for the given name could be found.
      class  RuntimeError
      Superclass of all Simple runtime errors.
      class  UninitializedInstanceError
      Runtime error indicating an access to an instance or array variable that is not properly initialized.
      class  UnknownFileHandleError
      Runtime error indicating an unknown file handle.
